Introduction of Kings Club Sports Facilities

Among Bangalore’s top sports clubs, King’s Club is among the most elite and luxurious. Here you can enjoy the lavish facilities made especially for keeping you on your toes while learning and enjoying various sports. 

 

A fitness academy has been designed to make you feel like a king. Our facility also includes a fully equipped Gym, Yoga center, a spacious exercise room, and a dance academy.  Our trained coaches will keep you engaged, motivated, and passionate by guiding and motivating you. The game court is an auditorium where you can show off your skills.  Whatever your sport is, whether it’s swimming, table tennis, or badminton, you’ll be able to enjoy it here.

Get training with the industry’s best instructors, gain access to facilities all day for a quick after-work match, meet fellow members, and even build business relationships. 

 

King’s Club’s sports academy energizes and strengthens your practice, setting your practice at the pace you need it.  Go one-on-one with personal coaching or take group fitness classes today. A superbly designed sports pace will get you started, in shape,  or energized.

Join today for group fitness classes, go one-on-one with personal coaching. Get started, get in shape, or get energized at a superbly designed sports pace.

Exclusive Training Packages

The weekend is a great chance to escape the monotonous and tiring work. Come and join the Kings Club’s sports academy that will help you master your favorite sport and bring out your sportsman psyche in the most wonderful way.   Spend time with your family and burn calories while taking part in our long list of sports activities like swimming, badminton, table tennis, billiards, and many more. The top trainers and 5-star amenities at our fitness academy provide you with everything you need to stay fit and young. Fitness facilities include gyms, steam rooms, yoga studios, and dance studios etc. 

Swimming Classes

Forgot your busy life & unwind in our swimming pool. Grab those extra laps for a healthy lifestyle or just order your favorite beverage & relax across the pool.
Read More

Badminton Classes

Cosset in the aerobic sports activity & burn the calories off. Badminton is a pre-eminent way to exercise while having merrymaking. Kings Club is home to an indoor/outdoor badminton facility with wooden flooring courts.
Read More

Sports Facility

Swimming Pool

Forgot your busy life & unwind in our swimming pool. Grab those extra laps for a healthy lifestyle or just order your favorite beverage & relax across the pool.

Badminton

Cosset in the aerobic sports activity & burn the calories off. Badminton is a pre-eminent way to exercise while having merrymaking. Kings Club is home to an indoor/outdoor badminton facility with wooden flooring courts.

Table Tennis

Table tennis is the most injury safe sport & can be enjoyed at every age & fitness levels. Kings Club has large and well-lit table tennis boards. The area has requisite space for seating guests who would like to watch the game

Billiards

Acquire hand & eye coordination at the most premium club available for sports facilities in Bangalore. Billiards is the best way to learn & built psychomotor skills. You will find carpeted and air-conditioned room that has world-class billiards tables and comfortable seating for those who would love to cheer the game on.

Features

Choose Your Sport

Train By Professional

Become A Pro

  • 5 Star Quality at Affordable Price
  • Perfect place for both Family and Sporting Crowd
  • Total Family Entertainer
  • Kids and Adults, Encourage them to go to the Next Level
  • World Class Facilities for Badminton, Swimming, Snooker & Table Tennis
  • Sports Club built-in 3 Acres

Exclusive Training Packages Below

Grab a chance to escape the tedious and tiresome workdays of the week. Come and be a part of Kings Club’s sports academy that will train you to master the game of your choice and bring out your sportsman psyche in a most wonderful way. Pamper yourself & your family in our long list of sports activities such as swimming pool, badminton, table tennis, Billiards, & many more and burn the calories off. Our fitness academy has all that you need to stay young as well as fit with the top trainers and 5-star amenities. You can also find Gym, steam room, Yoga facility, & Dance center to keep up with your fitness requirements.

Upcoming Sports Calendar

Kings Club provides sports facilities & events to people of every age from children right up to senior citizens. This all makes Kings Club a unique & special & magnificent place to be a home away from home.
10 Dec

SNOW BOARDING

  • 12:00 pm
  • Bangalore
Read More
10 Dec

  • 12:00 pm
  • Bangalore
Read More

Testimonials

The badminton court is the highlight of the club. It is well-lit, ambient, and well maintained. The coach is super professional and experienced. All in all the experience is exhilarating!

Ravi Kumar

Infrastructure is great and very aesthetic too Club amenities are too good party hall indoor and outdoor Sports facilities like swimming pool snooker, Court and coaching is too good Raju coach is too friendly. Multi cuisine Restaurant food is too tasty and delicious.

Sharath Babu

Kings Club Badminton court is kept clean & have appropriate lights. Excellent facility...

Ramesh

Played badminton after ages and loved every moment. Great courts and extremely well maintained.

Kumar.MB

Nice floor, clean and not dusty like others. Grip is good and perfect. Lots of parking inside.

Deepak Jain

I really like the quality of the courts, seems like they are not compromised over the quality. It's really quite an experience to play there.

Manjunath

I am glad share my experience, Its been very good, Professional trainers, Well maintained pool and motivational thoughts. I was thinking swimming is very difficult before joining but its very very easy now...

Kiran

Very Good place to swim. Coaching is available. Coach is really good

Yogesh

Knowledgeable, very patient and encouraging coaches. We liked their attitude. Neatly maintained, advanced filtering & no chlorine. Really awesome place to swim...

Srinidhi Adiga

Very good facility for kids and adults alike to learn swimming... Very good coaches as well

Basavaraj

FAQ

1. What types of Sports Facilities are available at Kings Club?
There are various sports facilities are available at Kings Club such as swimming pool, badminton, table tennis, Billiards, & many more.
2. Do we need to become a member to access sports facilities in clubs?
Yes
3. Do clubs have professional coaches?
Yes, we have the best professional coaches.
4. Do Clubs hold tournaments?
Yes, definitely.
